Room.Name: Castle Kayleigh Stairwell
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a stone stairwell in a fire-blackened old castle.
Room.LongDescription: Huge timbers, partially burned through, have fallen in to the center of the tower. Down below are a number of archways going to the castle proper. a little way overhead you can see the open doorway to the turret deck. You have apparentley disturbed some rather large bats, which are circling above you. Scrawled in the soot on the wall is the single word, "Silventh."
